pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena devadatto saṃghabhedāya parakkamati cakkabhedāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.5: Kathañhi nāma devadatto saṃghabhedāya parakkamissati cakkabhedāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.6: Evaṃ vutte, kokāliko kaṭamodakatissako khaṇḍadeviyā putto samuddadatto te bhikkhū etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.9: Amhākañca devadatto chandañca ruciñca ādāya voharati jānāti no bhāsati amhākampetaṃ khamatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.10: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.12: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū devadattassa saṃghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā bhavissanti vaggavādakā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.13: Atha kho te bhikkhū te anuvattake bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.14: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū devadattassa saṃghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā honti vaggavādakā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.17: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā devadattassa saṃghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā bhavissanti vaggavādakā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.18: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.19: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.20: “Tasseva kho pana bhikkhussa bhikkhū honti anuvattakā vaggavādakā eko vā dve vā tayo vā. Te evaṃ vadeyyuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.23: Dhammavādī ceso bhikkhu, vinayavādī ceso bhikkhu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.24: Amhākañceso bhikkhu chandañca ruciñca ādāya voharati jānāti no bhāsati amhākampetaṃ khamatī’ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.27: na ceso bhikkhu dhammavādī, na ceso bhikkhu vinayavādī,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.29: sametāyasmantānaṃ saṃghena, samaggo hi saṃgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.31: Evañca te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyyuṃ, te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.32: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.6: yaṃdiṭṭhiko so hoti yaṃkhantiko yaṃruciko tepi taṃdiṭṭhikā honti taṃkhantikā taṃrucikā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.9: Eko vā dve vā tayo vāti
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.10: eko vā hoti dve vā tayo vā. Te evaṃ vadeyyuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.12: “māyasmanto etaṃ bhikkhuṃ kiñci avacuttha, dhammavādī ceso bhikkhu, vinayavādī ceso bhikkhu,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.14: amhākañceso bhikkhu chandañca ruciñca ādāya voharati jānāti no bhāsati amhākampetaṃ khamatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.18: aññehi bhikkhūhi. Ye passanti ye suṇanti tehi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.21: Na ceso bhikkhu dhammavādī, na ceso bhikkhu vinayavādī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.24: Samaggo hi saṃgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.32: Na ceso bhikkhu dhammavādī, na ceso bhikkhu vinayavādī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.35: Samaggo hi saṃgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.44: Itthannāmo ca itthanāmo ca bhikkhū itthannāmassa bhikkhuno saṃghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā vaggavādakā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.46: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhū samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.49: Itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhū itthannāmassa bhikkhuno saṃghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā vaggavādakā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.51: Saṃgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhū samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.52: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa ca itthannāmassa ca bhikkhūnaṃ samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.57: Itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhū itthannāmassa bhikkhuno saṃghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā vaggavādakā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.59: Saṃgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhū samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.60: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa ca itthannāmassa ca bhikkhūnaṃ samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.62: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṃghena itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhū tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.68: Saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjantānaṃ ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.69: Dve tayo ekato samanubhāsitabbā, taduttari na samanubhāsitabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:3.1.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjanti, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:3.1.2: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjanti, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:3.1.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjanti, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
